name: CRT (Cathode Ray Tube) screen
snippet: The procedure for cleaning a CRT screen is different; this guide does not include such a procedure.

name: Tap Water
snippet: Tap water contains minerals and similar things which can leave harmful deposits on your screen.

name: Windex
snippet: Entirely too harsh to use on an LCD screen.

name: Bleach
snippet: Entirely too harsh to use on an LCD screen.

name: Other chemical cleaning agents
snippet: Chemical cleaning agents like those above are harsh and can damage the screen severly.
